about.title: Electronic Dictionary
about.subtitle: Electronic Dictionary and Word Search Application

intro.title: Electronic Dictionary
intro.text: is an electronic database that allows you to search and explore words, their translations, linguistic relations, and connections through an intuitive search interface.

project.title: About the Project
project.text: This project provides a comprehensive platform for searching words, viewing their translations, and understanding their relationships within the linguistic database. The database contains words with their original and Armenian translations, along with connections to related words, authors, translators, and source materials.

goals.title: Project Goals
goals.text: The goal of this program is to provide easy access to a vast collection of words and their linguistic information. The electronic database enables users to:
items: Search for words in multiple languages
Access information about authors, translators, and source materials
Navigate through word relationships and linguistic structures

features.title: Features
features.text: Being unique in its kind, this project has both theoretical and practical significance. The database provides:
items: Fast and efficient word search functionality
Visual representation of word connections and relationships
Access to metadata including authors, translators, and source books
User-friendly interface for exploring linguistic data

contact.title: Contact
contact.text: For questions, suggestions, or inquiries about the electronic dictionary, please contact us:
